definitions.definition: To detect with the senses, especially with the eyes.
To perceive, recognize, or comprehend with the mind; to descry.
To distinguish something as being different from something else; to differentiate.
definitions.example: He was too young to discern right from wrong.

definitions.definition: Of keen insight or good judgement; perceptive.
definitions.example: The discerning customer will appreciate our new range of quality clothing.
